name: 自我覺察與成長
description: Through lecture, reading, discussion, group report, meditation, self-awareness exercise, homework, and films, we hope to have students look into themselves and explore self. Enhance self-understanding and growth, and then integrate and enhance self-efficacy and mental health. Therefore, this course hopes to help students in: 1Understanding the importance of self-awareness, self-exploration and self-growth. 2. Understand how personal growth affects the efficiency and professional role of the helping profession, such as counselors and teachers. 3. Can apply to personal daily life and enhance personal mental health. 4. Cultivate interest and willing attitude to engage in counseling.
goals: 具備深入自我探索、了解自我的心理、輔導的基礎知識
透過各個諮商理論的內涵深入了解自己各個層面，具備輔導知能，促進個人的身心健康
培養國際觀，由多元不同的角度深入了解自己與他人
深入了解自己，並尊重每個人的獨特性與個別差異
培養以「人」為本的人文情懷，及樂於助人及助己的態度
